title: Height of plateau form launch speed and angle

content.question: A projectile is launched with a speed of 40 m/s at an angle of 30° above the horizontal, as shown in the figure below. The projectile lands on a plateau 3 s later. The height Δy of the plateau is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
